events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position and appreciate your interest in joining our team.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department, specifically for software development roles.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to guide you through the hiring process for the Software Engineer position.
We completed the initial screening of your application and are impressed with your background in software development.
Thank you for promptly responding with your availability for the interview; this helps us move forward quickly.
Your technical interview with our engineering team has been scheduled for May 15th at 2 PM UTC.
You successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating strong skills and problem-solving abilities.
Your HR interview has been scheduled for May 18th to discuss company culture and benefits in detail.
The HR interview concluded positively, and we believe you are a great cultural fit for our engineering team.
We are excited to propose you an offer for the Software Engineer position, including a competitive salary and benefits.
You provided positive feedback regarding the offer and expressed enthusiasm about joining our engineering team.
We are delighted that you accepted the offer and look forward to your onboarding as a Software Engineer.
Your onboarding process has started, and we are excited to welcome you to the Engineering department.
The hiring process for the Software Engineer role has been successfully closed, and the candidate is now onboarded.
